title: Tata Power to invest Rs 1.2 lk crore in power distribution, transmission and renewables in Rajasthan
description: Tata Power will invest Rs 1.2 lakh crore in Rajasthan over the next decade, focusing on renewable energy. The plan includes 10,000 MW of new capacity, grid modernization, and EV charging points. The investment aims to make Rajasthan a power surplus state and contribute significantly to India's energy goals, creating 28,000 jobs in the process.
